shortdesc.ph: The options of the watermark image to be added.

pd.p:
水印图片在本地视频预览中是否可见：
: (Default) The watermark image is displayed in the preview.
：水印图片在本地视频预览中不可见。

横屏模式下，显示水印图片的区域。 Relevant links:
x: The horizontal offset from the top-left corner.
y: The vertical offset from the top-left corner.
width: The width (pixels) of the area.
height: The height (pixels) of the area. 横屏模式的定义详见基础功能《设置视频编码属性》。

竖屏模式下，显示水印图片的区域。 See :
x: The horizontal offset from the top-left corner.
y: The vertical offset from the top-left corner.
width: The width (pixels) of the area.
height: The height (pixels) of the area. 竖屏模式的定义详见基础功能《设置视频编码属性》。
